members.name: Utah Jazz
members.address: 301 S Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
members.description: The Utah Jazz are a professional Basketball team that plays in the NBA. It is located in Utah, known for their dominant era in the 1990s with Hall of Famers Karl Malone and John Stockton, reaching the NBA Finals twice (1997, 1998), and multiple division championships.

members.name: Park City Utah
members.description: park City is a world-renowned mountain resort town famous for skiing, the Sundance Film Festival, and year-round outdoor recreation. Located in the Wasatch Mountains, it hosted events during the 2002 Winter Olympics and features historic Main Street with galleries, restaurants, and shops.

members.name: Salt Lake Temple
members.address: 50 W North Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84150
members.description: The Salt Lake Temple was created by the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. The temple took 40 years to build, and its completion was in the 1893. The temple is there to provide everyone with the opportunity to receive the blessings associated with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

members.name: Utah Mammoths
members.address: 301 W South Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
members.description: The Utah Mammoths are a professional hockey team that came to Utah in April of 2024.

members.name: Timpanogos Mountain
members.address: Timpanogos Cave National Monument, American Fork, UT 84003
members.description: Timpanogos is a beautiful mountian located in Utah just an hour away from Salt Lake City.

members.name: BYU
members.description: BYU (Brigham Young University) is a college that was founded by one of the early settlers in Utah, Brigham Young. The College is located just 45 miles away from SLC.

members.name: University of Utah
members.address: 201 Presidents Cir, Salt Lake City, UT 84112
members.description: University of Utah is a college located within Salt lake city.

members.name: This Is The Place Heritage Park
members.address: 2601 Sunnyside Ave, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
members.description: THis is the place heritage park is located in salt lake city, and it is a monument created for the early pioneers who settled in Salt Lake City Utah.
